alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 2:06PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Greene, eastern Clay, northern Pemiscot and northeastern Dunklin Counties through 245 PM CST... At 206 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Qulin to near Marmaduke. Movement was east at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Malden, Piggott, Portageville, Campbell, Rector, Marmaduke, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Oak Grove Heights, Holcomb, Wardell, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, McDougal, Glennonville, Bolton, Saint Francis, Crockett and Bragg City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
